name: Choong-Jang
meaning: Choong-Jang is the pseudonym given to General Kim Duk Ryang who lived during the Yi Dynasty, 14th Century. This pattern ends with a left-hand attack to symbolise the tragedy of his death at 27 in prison before he was able to reach full maturity.

moves.title: Closed Ready Stance A
moves.description: Closed ready stance A, facing 12 o'clock.
moves.korean: moa junbi sogi A

moves.title: Side front block
moves.description: Step right to 3 o'clock into sitting stance. Right inner forearm side front block with left downward block.
moves.korean: annun so an palmok yopap makgi

moves.title: Side front block
moves.description: Remain in sitting stance. Left inner forearm side front block with right downward block.
moves.korean: annun so an palmok yopap makgi

moves.title: Angle punch
moves.description: Bring right foot to left. Perform slow left angle punch across the chest.
moves.korean: moa so giokja jirugi

moves.title: High double finger thrust
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into walking stance. Perform right reverse high double finger thrust.
moves.korean: gunnun so doo sangarak nopunde tulgi

moves.title: High double finger thrust
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into walking stance. Perform left reverse high double finger thrust.
moves.korean: gunnun so doo sangarak nopunde tulgi

moves.title: Backfist front strike
moves.description: Remain facing 12 o'clock. Perform right backfist front strike.
moves.korean: gunnun so dung joomuk ap taerigi

moves.title: Rising block
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock. Perform left outer forearm rising block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok chookyo makgi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock. Perform right middle punch.
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi

moves.title: Forearm guarding block
moves.description: Pivot left 360 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Slide back to 6 o'clock into L-stance with middle forearm guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Front low snap kick
moves.description: Facing 12 o'clock, perform right low front snap kick.
moves.korean: najunde apcha busigi

moves.title: High flat fingertip thrust
moves.description: Land in low stance. Perform right high flat fingertip thrust.
moves.korean: nachuo so opun sonkut nopunde tulgi

moves.title: High turning kick
moves.description: Drop to left knee, body angled toward 10 o'clock. Perform high right turning kick to 12 o'clock.
moves.korean: nopunde dollyo chagi

moves.title: High punch
moves.description: Land forward. Left hand on floor. Perform right high punch to 12 o'clock.
moves.korean: nopunde ap jirugi

moves.title: Side elbow thrust
moves.description: Stand and pivot right to face 6 o'clock. Step into left L-stance with left side elbow thrust.
moves.korean: niunja so yop palkup tulgi

moves.title: Forearm guarding block
moves.description: Pivot right 180 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Left L-stance with middle forearm guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Palm scooping block
moves.description: Step back to 6 o'clock into L-stance. Perform left palm scooping block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonbadak duro makgi

moves.title: Knife-hand outward strike
moves.description: Step back to 6 o'clock into L-stance. Perform right middle knife-hand outward strike.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi

moves.title: X-fist pressing block
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step into walking stance with X-fist pressing block.
moves.korean: gunnun so kyocha joomuk kaunde noollo makgi

moves.title: Knee snap kick
moves.description: Facing 6 o'clock, pull hands to left hip and perform right knee snap kick.
moves.korean: moorup najunde apcha busigi

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Form right L-stance with knife-hand guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Right side elbow thrust
moves.description: Slide left foot forward, then slide back to 12 o'clock. Right L-stance with right elbow thrust.
moves.korean: niunja so yop palkup tulgi

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Left L-stance knife-hand guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal

moves.title: Side piercing kick
moves.description: Facing 12 o'clock, perform right side piercing kick.
moves.korean: kaunde yopcha jirugi

moves.title: Twin palm pressing block
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 6 o'clock into rear-foot stance. Perform twin palm pressing block.
moves.korean: dwitbal so sang sonbadak noollo makgi

moves.title: Forearm block & backfist strike
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into walking stance. High outer forearm block followed by high side backfist strike.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok/dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi

moves.title: High flat fingertip thrust
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 12 o'clock into L-stance. Perform high flat fingertip thrust.
moves.korean: niunja so opun sonkut nopunde tulgi

moves.title: Front low snap kick
moves.description: Facing 12 o'clock, perform right low front snap kick.
moves.korean: najunde apcha busigi

moves.title: Right elbow thrust
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Slide into position and perform right elbow thrust.
moves.korean: gunnun so palkup dwit tulgi

moves.title: Back hand downward strike
moves.description: Stamp into right L-stance facing 6 o'clock. Perform left back-hand downward strike.
moves.korean: niunja so sondung naeryo taerigi

moves.title: Punch palm
moves.description: In right L-stance, punch into the left palm.
moves.korean: niunja so jirugi

moves.title: Back hand downward strike
moves.description: Stamp into left L-stance facing 6 o'clock. Perform right back-hand downward strike.
moves.korean: niunja so sondung naeryo taerigi

moves.title: Palm punch
moves.description: In left L-stance, punch into the right palm.
moves.korean: niunja so jirugi

moves.title: Knife-hand outward strike
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Stamp into right L-stance with knife-hand outward strike.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi

moves.title: Backfist high side front strike
moves.description: Step into walking stance. Perform high backfist side-front strike.
moves.korean: gunnun so dung joomuk nopunde yopcha taerigi

moves.title: Middle knife-hand outward strike
moves.description: Stamp into left L-stance facing 12 o'clock. Perform middle knife-hand outward strike.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi

moves.title: Backfist high side front strike
moves.description: Step into walking stance. Perform left high backfist side-front strike.
moves.korean: niunja so dung joomuk nopunde yopcha taerigi

moves.title: Low reverse knife-hand block
moves.description: Pivot left 180 degrees to face 6 o'clock into left L-stance. Perform low reverse knife-hand block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal dung najunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Right 9-shape block
moves.description: Step into walking stance. Perform right 9-shape block, right arm low.
moves.korean: gunnun so gutja makgi

moves.title: Low reverse knife-hand block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into left L-stance. Perform low reverse knife-hand block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal dung najunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Left 9-shape block
moves.description: Step into walking stance. Perform left 9-shape block, left arm low.
moves.korean: gunnun so gutja makgi

moves.title: Twin horizontal knife-hand strike
moves.description: Step behind to 12 o'clock into walking stance. Perform twin horizontal knife-hand strike.
moves.korean: gunnun so sang sonkal soopyong taerigi

moves.title: High arc-hand strike
moves.description: Remain facing 6 o'clock. Perform right high arc-hand strike.
moves.korean: gunnun so bandal son nopunde taerigi

moves.title: Low front snap kick
moves.description: Facing 6 o'clock, perform right low front snap kick.
moves.korean: kaunde apcha busigi

moves.title: High arc-hand strike
moves.description: Lower foot into walking stance. Perform left high arc-hand strike.
moves.korean: gunnun so bandal son nopunde taerigi

moves.title: Low front snap kick
moves.description: Facing 6 o'clock, perform left low front snap kick.
moves.korean: kaunde apcha busigi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Lower foot into walking stance. Perform right middle punch.
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi

moves.title: Middle punch
moves.description: Perform left middle punch. Fast motion.
moves.korean: gunnun so kaunde ap jirugi

moves.title: High twin fore-knuckle fist punch
moves.description: Bring feet together facing 6 o'clock. Perform high twin fore-knuckle crescent punch.
moves.korean: moa so sang inji joomuk nopunde bandal jirugi

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Pivot left 270 degrees to face 9 o'clock into walking stance. Perform low left knife-hand block.
moves.korean: gunnun so sonkal najunde makgi

moves.title: High open fist punch
moves.description: Facing 9 o'clock, perform right high open-fist punch.
moves.korean: gunnun so pyon joomuk nopunde jirugi

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn right 180 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Perform low right knife-hand block.
moves.korean: gunnun so sonkal najunde makgi

moves.title: High open fist punch
moves.description: Facing 3 o'clock, perform left high open-fist punch.
moves.korean: gunnun so pyon joomuk nopunde jirugi

moves.title: Closed ready stance A
moves.description: Pivot left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Return to closed ready stance A.
moves.korean: moa junbi sogi A
